data.title: Vax for the Win – Dream Vacations
data.author: Peggy Gartin
data.excerpt: Terms and Conditions PURPOSE:  The California Department of Public Health (CDPH) will conduct a series of randomized drawings for prizes to be awarded to vaccinated persons in order to reinforce the importance of vaccination as a way to protect public health in the face of a pandemic. The persons identified in the drawings will be […]
